Key Match Events: Andrés Giménez drilled an RBI single into right field to score automatic runner José Ramírez for Cleveland’s second straight walk-off victory
Post-Match Reflections: Stephen Vogt said until he saw Giménez’s line drive hit green grass, he had not allowed himself to get excited about reaching the postseason
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians were not a popular pick to reach the playoffs when the season started, but have spent the last 23 weeks perched atop the American League Central Division
Others: The Guardians are 10-3 in extra-inning games and notched their 42nd comeback win while improving the best home record in the AL to 48-28
